闔廬.definition: King Helu of Wu (-496 BC, reigned 514-496 BC); also called 闔閭|阖闾

闔閭.definition: King Helu of Wu (-496 BC, reigned 514-496 BC); also called 闔廬|阖庐

闔閭城.definition: capital city of King Helu of Wu from 6th century BC, at modern Wuxi, Jiangsu

闔閭城遺址.definition: ruins of capital city of King Helu of Wu, from 6th century BC, at modern Wuxi, Jiangsu
